attributes.action: stop cuts to grays fire station
attributes.additional_details: Essex County Fire and Rescue Service plan to remove a specialist rescue appliance (Rescue Tender) and change crewing arrangements that will reduce the ability of the service to deal with emergencies in and around Grays. Grays is home to over a third of the counties major risks, Europe's largest regeneration plan, the counties busiest road network, Dartford crossing and should have a local fire service that represents this.
